trans-unit.source: Creates a filter template.
trans-unit.target: 建立篩選器範本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterFactory> class is used at run time by Dynamic Data to get an instance of a filter template for a specific column type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterFactory>類別可在執行階段由動態資料來取得特定資料行類型的篩選器範本執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can override the methods that are defined in this class to customize how filter templates are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫這個類別，以自訂方式載入篩選的範本中所定義的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, a custom implementation could load the filter templates from a location different than the default ~/DynamicData/Filters folder.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，自訂實作可以從不同於預設 ~/DynamicData/Filters 資料夾的位置載入篩選範本。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Data provides filter templates for foreign-key, Boolean, and enumeration column types and displays them by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 動態資料提供的篩選器範本的外部索引鍵、 Boolean 和列舉型別資料行類型並將其顯示使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom filter templates.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立自訂篩選器範本。

trans-unit.source: For an example of table row filtering uses the default filter templates, see the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> class.
trans-unit.target: 如範例的資料表資料列篩選會使用預設篩選器範本，請參閱<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data column to which the filter template applies.
trans-unit.target: 篩選器範本要套用到其中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The name of the filter template to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的篩選器範本名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the filter template.
trans-unit.target: 建立篩選器範本的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by Dynamic Data to get an instance of a filter template.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的篩選器範本執行個體的動態資料會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this method to customize how instances of filter templates are created.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法，以自訂的篩選器範本執行個體的建立方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, a custom implementation could load templates from a compiled assembly instead of from the default ~/DynamicData/Filters folder.
trans-unit.target: 例如，自訂實作可以從編譯的組件而不是從預設 ~/DynamicData/Filters 資料夾載入範本。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="column" /> is **null**.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="column" /> 為 **null**。

trans-unit.source: The data column to which the filter template applies.
trans-unit.target: 篩選器範本要套用到其中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The filter template to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的篩選器範本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual path of the filter template.
trans-unit.target: 取得篩選器範本的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the filter template.
trans-unit.target: 篩選器範本的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: By default, filter templates are located in the ~/DynamicData/Filers folder.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，篩選器範本位於 ~/DynamicData/Filers 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: This method determines the virtual path of the folder that contains the field template.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會判斷的欄位樣板所在的資料夾中的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this method to provide filter templates from a different virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法以提供篩選器範本，從不同的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="column" /> is **null**.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="column" /> 為 **null**。
